game.description: A thrilling adventure awaits you as you embark on a dangerous quest to rescue the stolen treasure of the kingdom.
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen treasure and return it to the king.

tasks.description: Investigate the forest to search for clues.
tasks.objective: Find any evidence leading to the whereabouts of the stolen treasure.

tasks.description: Explore the old ruins of the abandoned castle.
tasks.objective: Uncover the secrets hidden within the castle and discover any leads on the stolen treasure.

tasks.description: Confront the notorious bandit gang in their secret hideout.
tasks.objective: Defeat the bandit leader and retrieve the stolen treasure from their possession.

game.title: The Treasure Heist
